    • Method Detail

      • getClass

        public static <T> Class<T> getClass(org.apache.kafka.common.config.AbstractConfig config,
                                    String key,
                                    Class<T> expected)
        Method is used to return a class that should be assignable to the expected class. For example when a user implements an interface that is loaded at runtime. It is good to ensure that the proper interface has been implemented.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Class type to return.
        Parameters:
        config - config that has the class setting
        key - key to read
        expected - expected parent class or interface
        Returns:
        Returns a class if it's assignable from the specified class.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Thrown if it fails expected.isAssignableFrom(cls).

      • getEnum

        public static <T extends Enum<T>> T getEnum(Class<T> enumClass,
                                            org.apache.kafka.common.config.AbstractConfig config,
                                            String key)
        Method is used to return an enum value from a given string.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Enum class to return type for.
        Parameters:
        enumClass - Class for the resulting enum value
        config - config to read the value from
        key - key for the value
        Returns:
        enum value for the given key.
        See Also:
        ValidEnum

      • enumValues

        public static String enumValues(Class<?> enumClass)
        Method is used to return the values for an enum.
        Parameters:
        enumClass - Enum class to return the constants for.
        Returns:
        Returns a comma seperated string of all of the values in the enum.

      • getAbsoluteFile

        public static File getAbsoluteFile(org.apache.kafka.common.config.AbstractConfig config,
                                   String key)
        Method is used to return a File checking to ensure that it is an absolute path.
        Parameters:
        config - config to read the value from
        key - key for the value
        Returns:
        File for the config value.
